content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Take a break with our leisure reading collection of books and ebooks - available to staff, students and library members. Browse our leisure reading titles in person at the libraries below or online via our reading lists or NUsearch. Browse books and ebooks online at: We also have a large range of fiction titles available at our arts and social sciences library, Hallward Library. You can find these on Level 4. Browse the collection on NUsearch Explore titles recommended by staff and students and share your suggestions of titles for our collections from underrepresented voices. DiversifyU suggestions Click through at the links above to view availability and access ebooks or search our whole collection on NUsearch. Log in to NUsearch with your UoN username to place a Click and Collect request. How to place a request Books can be borrowed at the self-service machines in our libraries. More about borrowing King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
